title: The Night Life of Trees
description: In the belief of the Gond tribe, the lives of humans and trees are closely entwined. Trees contain the cosmos; when night falls, the spirits they nurture glimmer into life. A visual ode to trees rendered by tribal artists from India, this handcrafted edition showcases three of the finest living Gond masters. This collection of their distinctive styles is enchantingâ€”an excellent gift for those fascinated by trees, art or folk traditions.
author: Bhajju Shyam
